scripts.tex: npm run tex:display; npm run tex:inline
scripts.tex:display: ls src/tex/display/*.tex | while read texfile; do cat $texfile | katex --display-mode > _includes/math/display/$(basename ${texfile%.tex}).html; done
scripts.tex:inline: ls src/tex/inline/*.tex | while read texfile; do cat $texfile | katex > _includes/math/inline/$(basename ${texfile%.tex}).html; done
